thread.title: AMR Resorts Introduces Enhancements to its Agent Loyalty Program
thread.title_full: AMR Resorts Introduces Enhancements to its Agent Loyalty Program

title: AMR Resorts Introduces Enhancements to its Agent Loyalty Program
text:
Last updated: 06:00 PM ET, Wed October 21 2015 AMR Resorts Introduces Enhancements to its Agent Loyalty Program Travel Agent | AMResorts | Robin Amster | October 21, 2015 
Photo courtesy of AMR Resorts 
AMR Resorts has introduced an automatic booking bonus as the latest enhancement to AMRewards, its travel agent loyalty program. < Do you want to read the full story? You must be a registered travel professional with an active account to view the full story. Are you a Travel Agent? Log in to your account now, or register for free! Sign In / Register
